title: Wow, this is what I have to deal with at low elo norms.
body:
Just fucking straight trash.
I have had one good support and three total fucking trash. No clue about zoning, no clue about positioning, no sight stones and no pinks.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/145449988/39244605?tab=overview

replies.body: on the flip side, they have to deal with you :P

A lot of the time in low ELO games, no  one wants to support. The guy who ends up in the support role, did not want that, he just didn't copy/pasta his preference quick enough. Then he gets paired with a douchebag ADC like you who does nothing but complain all game.
Your language in these forums says it all, and I'll bet you're even worse in game.
If I got paired with you (if I played rift) and you behave like it seems you do every game, I'd just go support another lane and let you get fucked.
I'm thinking you're getting what you deserve.

No wonder no one likes to support in these low level games.

I'm quite pleasant in games. I don't be toxic but I do call out bad players. I can't help it. I hate players who ruin other peoples games because they don't know basics. 
The other day when I was graves jg in ranked I made a mistake and was told I was bad by my mid.
I jsut said I was sorry, was having a bad fathers day and that if he could jsut show a little patience I would get better which I did, i manned up and at the end he said sorry for haveinga  go at me and said don't worry about it. Water of a ducks back. Why because that's what I do to others as well. If they can man up and see their mistakes hopefully they won't do it again. If no one ever points out mistakes how can you learn from them.
But yeah na, if they can't play a fucking role then watch a video, look up a guide and go play bots or customes and fucking learn.
I can play every role and I expect everyone else to as well. No excuses. 
If an old guy like me who suffers pain all the time can do it so can everyone else no excuses.

Whats you summoner name? You sound like fun to play with, as long as you use voice comms lol

EDIT: Flag that, stalked you and found your summoner name in case the one here isn't it, friend request sent

>No wonder no one likes to support in these low level games.

I enjoyed playing support on smurf account, it was fun ditching an ADC to get someone else on my team fed, instead of wasting my time.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=NbtUYek3,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2016-09-05T13:31:59.893+0000)
>
> I enjoyed playing support on smurf account, it was fun ditching an ADC to get someone else on my team fed, instead of wasting my time.

Exactly. Why support a douchebag ADC, who bitches at everything, when you could go support a competent top or mid?

Whilst I don't understand genuine frustration over a computer game, I can understand why some would feel uptight about having their ranked games ruined by inexperienced players.
But if it's norms, well in my opinion you just deal with who you get because norms is meant for the masses who just want to have fun and mess about. It's basically like a test and tune day for racing, stuff around with different things and try new shit out, have a bit of fun while you're at it.

I never flame or judge anyone in norms because I know that's exactly what it's for. So everyone just gotta deal with it.
I purposefully haven't given ranked a go much this season because I know I'm not ready for it, and I have a lot to learn still.

I'm all for trying to make this game a balanced set, champ/item nerfs/buffs etc...

But if you don't like all the toddlers playing and pissing in the toddlers pool, don't get in the toddlers pool in the first place. Go swim in the big boys pool if that's where you think you belong.

Lol at least it's not ranked. I got to my B5 promos almost straight away, I was just carrying some noobs with Nasus.

As soon as I get to my promos however I get silver MMR (but my team is still bronze rip) and while I'm going 3/0 in bot as jinx our Vladimir top literally goes 0/9 by ten minutes. I didn't even think it was possible to feed that much?!?!?!?

I am playing ranked now and was on my 7th game after win 6 in a row. I copped the enemy adc as my supp from the game before where I just rekt them. 
We lost that game. Was keen for my 7th win but tilted players.
Enemy Morg was third pick and Ali was last but yet still picked Ali into Vayne/Morg even though I  pleaded for Sona.
Ther are so many fucking trash players in ranked it's just not fair.
That and coming up against boosters/smurfs as well makes is so fucking hard to carry.
7 games lost in a row means time have a fucking break but these fucking trash players just keep on going and ruin other people games.
What pisses me off the most is they don't understand playing passive, they just keep being agressive or they buy offensive items and just keep going ham into a 3 levels above enemy laner.
We need a division under bronze so they can learn the fucking basics of league.
I hate playing in bronze but dealing with an illness and being 39 makes playing league very hard for me.
I can carry in bot lane but it takes a decent support who knows zoning, positioning and items builds.

You should be building defensively because that ezreal is fed. Also, I do not expect you to win your lane because you have a gankplank support, that champion can't peel or help you sustain in any way, only poking which clearly doesn't work because sona has heal and can give high amount of sustain to ezreal. I understand that you are frustrated but trust me bro when you realize your mistakes and you start improving on it, you would be climbing. Was placed at Bronze 3 and was ALWAYS calling out bad players and heck I didn't climb. Started analyzing my mistakes carefully and boom I made it to silver 3 promos and I went on a losing streak which put me back at silver 4. I just have to hustle back to silver 3. Goodluck :P

It's because YOU'RE BRONZE. 
NOBODY in Bronze is good. NOBODY.
Don't expect ANYTHING from ANYONE in Bronze. 
The sooner you learn that, the better it'll be for us cos you'll stop posting your bad games on the boards.

I won't learn to play support. I simply don't find it entertaining in the slightest.
I play games for fun, not for tedium.

So your idea that everyone should be willing to play support can fuck off.
